lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Are you listenin'? Hear me talk, hear me sing
Open up the door, easy less, easy more
Tell me to beware, are you here, are you there?
Is there something I should know? Easy come, easy go

[Pre-Chorus 1]
Noddin your head, don't hear a word I say
I can't communicate, when you wait, don't relate
I try to talk to you but you never even knew
So.what's it gonna be? Tell me can you hear me?
(hear me? can you hear?)

[Chorus]
I'm so sick of it, your attention deficit
Never listen, never listen
I'm so sick of it, so I'll throw another fit
Never listen, never listen
I scream your name! It always stays the same
I scream and shout! So what I'm gonna do?
Now is freak the freak out

[Post-Chorus]
Hey! Whoa-whoa-whoa-whoa

[Verse 2]
Patience running thin, running thin, come again
Tell me what I get, opposite opposite
Show me what is real, if it breaks, does it heal?
Open up your ear, why d'you think that I'm here?

[Pre-Chorus 2]
Keep me in the dark,are you even thinking of me?
Is there someone else above me, gotta know gotta know
What am I gonna do, 'cause I can't get through to you
So what's it gonna be, tell me can u hear me?

[Chorus]
I'm so sick of it, your attention deficit
Never listen, never listen
I'm so sick of it, so I'll throw another fit
Never listen, never listen
I scream your name! It always stays the same
I scream and shout! So what I'm gonna do?
Now is freak the freak out

[Post-Chorus]
Hey! Whoa-whoa-whoa-whoa
Whoa whoa whoa whoa
I scream your name
Is freak the freak out
Whoa whoa whoa whoa
Whoa whoa whoa whoa

[Outro]
I scream your name!
It always stays the same
I scream and shout!
So what I'm gonna do
Now is freak the freak out
Hey!
Whoa-whoa-whoa-whoa
Now is freak the freak out. [x15]
Oh...
I scream your name!
But you never listen!
Oh...
But you never listen
